resources.string: Server is taking more time to respond, Please try again

In this fast moving world where people find little time to spend with their own family, it is difficult to find time to read newspaper and stay updated with the current affairs. Reading newspaper might sometimes be time taking considering the size of the article. Sometimes people give the article an skip due to lethargy if it is too long. Information through listening and visuals is quickly perceived compared to reading. To make things easier, the Refresh News - only real can be used to scan the headlines from the newspaper and fetch relevant news from the world wide web
This is first version of app and its is in English Language.
Ragini\n Roll: 1807340, Branch: EEE, Section:EEE5\n Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology

Headline of news can be viewed using below categories
1. Country
2.Busienss
3.Technology
4.Entertainment
5.Sports
6.Science
7.Health
8.General
We can track news Sources By clicking on Library\nNews Sources list we can see and its details.
We can search news by entering keyworad and Application will give search result till last one month old data.
This app can be used without login and by login using Phone number
